opptjening-intro-text: Here you will find a comprehensive overview of your pension earnings.
opptjening-number-of-years-with-pensjons: Number of years with pension points:
opptjening-income-link-to-skatteetaten: Information abount income comes from skattemeldingen at Skatteetaten.
pensjonsbeholdning-forklart-tekst: The pension assets corresponds to the sum of annual pension earnings in the National Insurance Scheme. The pension portfolio is used as a starting point for calculating the retirement pension you receive from NAV when you re.
Remember: You may also be entitled to another state or private savings pension from an employer.
opptjening-details-beholdning-i-starten-: Assets at the start of the year
opptjening-details-opptjening-basert-paa: Earnings based on first-time military service* ({{grunnlag}})
opptjening-details-lurer-du-paa-se-ofte-: Wondering what {{grunnlagTypes}} means in this context?  See frequently asked questions further down.
opptjening-details-les-mer-om-hvordan-vi: Read about how we calculate the pension.
error-status-403: A technical problem occured. Please try to log in again later.  We are sorry for the inconvenience.
error-status-404: We are not able to find the page or service you are looking for.
